headline: Will Dividend Affirmation And Argus Upgrade Shift AES' (AES) Renewables And Earnings Visibility Narrative?
summary: The AES Corporation’s Board of Directors has declared a quarterly common stock dividend of US$0.17595 per share, payable on February 13, 2026, to shareholders of record as of January 30, 2026. Alongside this dividend affirmation, an Argus Research upgrade to “Buy” adds another layer of attention to AES’s evolving investment case. We’ll now examine how the Argus Research upgrade may influence AES’s investment narrative built around renewables growth and earnings visibility. Find companies...

headline: Assessing AES’s Valuation After Argus Research Upgrades the Stock to ‘Buy’
summary: Argus Research just upgraded AES (AES) from Hold to Buy, and that endorsement is what likely nudged the stock, even as the company quietly reaffirmed its regular quarterly dividend policy. See our latest analysis for AES. That upgrade lands after a choppy stretch where AES has clawed back from deeper losses, with a roughly mid single digit year to date share price return and a stronger 1 year total shareholder return, suggesting momentum is cautiously rebuilding despite a still weak multi...
